description: An investigation of the heavy metal levels in sediment and interstitial waters, and their effect on community structure of marine soft-bottom benthos from Port of Spain to Chaguaramas.  Metals tested included cadmium (Cd), chromium (Cr), copper (Cu), iron (Fe), nickel (Ni), lead (Pb) and zinc (Zn).
keywords: _2003_marine_fauna_metals, benthic ecology, cadmium, chromium, copper, environment, features, iron, lead, marine fauna, nickel, zinc, Trinidad and Tobago
name: TV_TTO_Trinidad_Chaguaramas_heavy_metal_contamination_of_marine_fauna_2003
